title: Fishy001
author: Fishy001
content: Want 300$ BTC Give 330$ BTC in 5 days  Type of collateral: 300$ ethereum.

comments.author: alterra57
comments.body: If you have 350 USD in ETH I will give you this loan.

comments.author: TryNinja
comments.body: Deposit the $300 eth into FTX and withdraw $270 btc (0.9 collateral weight). That's probably the best you can get since probably no one here will give you a 1:1 loan rate. You'll also pay a lot less.

comments.author: Don Pedro Dinero
comments.body: As if we should trust the OP.He is one of those who believes he has discovered a "winning" strategy in casino games that is older than Methuselah: the Martingale.I find way to win on diceWith a quick look at his post history, we see other "strategies" and accusations of scam casinos, so he is most likely a gambling addict, someone impulsive, that if he is willing to pay 10% interest in 5 days, there is a high risk that he will not pay it back. How much is 10% in 5 days in APR? 1500% or more?

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: Don Pedro Dinero on October 25, 2022, 06:30:08 AMAs if we should trust the OP.He is one of those who believes he has discovered a "winning" strategy in casino games that is older than Methuselah: the Martingale.I find way to win on diceWith a quick look at his post history, we see other "strategies" and accusations of scam casinos, so he is most likely a gambling addict, someone impulsive, that if he is willing to pay 10% interest in 5 days, there is a high risk that he will not pay it back. How much is 10% in 5 days in APR? 1500% or more?I find it much more interesting that he won't open his PC for betting under $300, while at the same time he doesn't have those $300 and is trying to borrow them here.winning strategies, a lot of money taken from the casino, and still stuck at 300.Quote from: Fishy001 on October 04, 2022, 01:58:01 PMI have been winning a lot in sportbook lately and they limit my bets for 70$ max on sport booking.  Only because I figured out how to win the system.This is ridiculous. Bellow 300$ for bet I don't open my pc.

comments.author: worldofcoins
comments.body: Quote from: Don Pedro Dinero on October 25, 2022, 06:30:08 AMAs if we should trust the OP.He is one of those who believes he has discovered a "winning" strategy in casino games that is older than Methuselah: the Martingale.I do remember I fell for that martingale strategy as ever winning one till I lost 24 times in a row and lost majority of my balance through that Martingale.

comments.author: hopenotlate
comments.body: Quote from: Fishy001 on September 28, 2022, 05:09:18 AMWant 300$ BTC Give 330$ BTC in 5 days  Type of collateral: 300$ ethereum. If you have ETH as collateral you can get your loan at fixed terms and fixed interest by your own in few minutes, in a completely decentralized way ( so without any intermediary : no need to trust anyone) with average lower interests than the ones usuallly practised here using the service in my signature : this is their site https://smartcredit.io/ and their web app https://appv2.smartcredit.io/app/dashboard if you don wanna click on my ref link.
